text: Tum kaho, Allah unke qayaam ki muddat(period of their stay) zyada jaanta hai, aasmano aur zameen ke sab posheeda ahwal usi ko maloom hain. Kya khoob hai woh dekhne wala aur sunne wala! Zameen o aasman ki makhlooqat ka koi khabar-geer uske siwa nahin , aur woh apni hukumat mein kisi ko shareek nahin karta
